alert.note: Alert for Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley; Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 11 at 2:33PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF SOUTHERN TWIN FALLS COUNTY...UPPER TREASURE VALLEY...WESTERN MAGIC VALLEY...AND SOUTHWEST HIGHLANDS COUNTIES... HAZARDS...Heavy snow and gusty winds to around 55 mph along a cold front will briefly lower the visibility to a quarter of a mile or less. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 228 PM MDT, heavy snow along a cold front was along a line extending from near Gooding to near China Mountain and moving east at 40 MPH. THIS SQUALL WILL BE NEAR... Gooding, Wendell, Buhl and Norton Bay around 230 PM MDT. Rogerson, Filer and Hollister around 240 PM MDT. Jerome, Twin Falls, Winter Spring and Magic Valley Regional Airport around 250 PM MDT. Kimberly, Hansen and Rock Creek around 300 PM MDT. Eden, Timber Butte, Minidoka National Monument and Murtaugh around 310 PM MDT. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&

area.areaDesc: Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands; Upper Treasure Valley; Western Magic Valley
